AD_DiscComment.synopsis: The spirit of the amulet comments on the Shar statue within the Shar Temple, near the moving disc. The Monk remenisces back to when he was tortured by Sharrans.
AD_DiscComment.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe MonkAmulet_Get" and equip the amulet.- Go to the Shar Temple disc- Enter S_SHA_MonkAmulet_DiscBanter_Trigger_e2d5e43c-0cd0-448f-a1eb-6c769c87a0de

AD_DiscComment_0.text: Well if it isn't our Mistress of Pain. HahaHAHA, what anguish she has visited upon me!
